name: Child Hat 6
description:
Material: Cotton and wool and soft to the touch. 
Measurement: 7.5 inches tall and 8.5 inches wide

Wear: This child-sized hat fits comfortably over the ears, or can be rolled up once. The colors are red and dark grey. 

Care: Hand wash cold or lukewarm water, shape, and dry flat.

All items in this shop are one of a kind handmade in St. Louis, MO, made in a non-smoking, pet free home. I do not accept custom orders at this time.

Thank you for visiting my shop!

name: Loop Scarf 3
description:
Material: Wool, cotton, acrylic and soft to the touch. 
Measurement: 34.5 inches long (69 inches total loop) and 10 inches wide

Wear: This large cowl-style scarf fits comfortably over your head to wear around your next for style and keeping warm. You can loop it around twice for added warmth. The colors are variations on red and white.  

Care: Hand wash cold or lukewarm water, shape, and dry flat.

All items in this shop are one of a kind handmade in St. Louis, MO, made in a non-smoking, pet free home. I do not accept custom orders at this time.

Thank you for visiting my shop!
